Name: Abbreviated Pre-Flight
checklistText:
1. All left panel fuses - NO. 1 POSITION
2. Squib switch - ARM
3. Auto retro jett switch - ARM
4. ASCS switch - NORM
5. RSCS switch - AUTO
6. Retro delay switch - NORM
7. Rescue switch - AUTO
8. Retro Att switch - AUTO
9. Landing Bag switch - AUTO
10. Control Fuel
      a. Auto Fuel: ___
      b. Manual Fuel: ___
11. Cabin Pressure Indicator: ___
12. Cabin Temp Indicator: ___
13. Suit Temp Indicator: ___
14. Suit Press Indicator: ___
15. Primary Oxygen: ___
16. Secondary Oxygen: ___
17. Suit Fan switch - NORM
18. Cabin Fan switch - NORM
19. DC Volts knob - MAIN
20. Ammeter switch - NORM
21. ASCS AC Bus Switch - NORM
22. Stby Btry switch - ON
23. Isol Btry switch - STBY
24. Inlet Valve Pwr switch - NORM
25. Audio Bus switch - NORM
26. Fans AC Bus switch - NORM
27. VOX Pwr switch - OFF
28. UHF DF switch - NORM
29. UHF Select switch - HI PWR
30. Transmit switch - OFF
31. Beacon switch - CONT
32. All main panel switches - NO. 1 POSITION
33. Emer O2 handle - NORM
